metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36187 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x before 2.9.10.8 mishandles the interactionbetween serialization gadgets and typing, related toorg.apache.tomcat.dbcp.dbcp.datasources.SharedPoolDataSource.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
